name: @csalvato/remarq
description: Lightweight annotation and feedback layer for HTML documents. Add collaborative commenting, highlighting, and threaded discussions to any webpage.

scripts.analyze:
esbuild src/index.js --bundle --format=iife --global-name=FeedbackLayer --minify --target=es2020 --metafile=meta.json --outfile=/tmp/feedback-layer-analysis.js && echo '
Bundle analysis:' && node -p "const meta=require('./meta.json'); const entries=Object.entries(meta.outputs[Object.keys(meta.outputs)[0]].inputs).map(([k,v])=>[v.bytesInOutput,k]).sort((a,b)=>b[0]-a[0]); entries.slice(0,20).map(([bytes,path])=>bytes.toString().padStart(8)+' '+path).join('\n')" && echo '
Total gzipped size:' && gzip -c /tmp/feedback-layer-analysis.js | wc -c | awk '{print $1/1024 " KB"}'

author: Christopher Salvato <csalvato@gmail.com>
